title: Collisions - changes in K and p

content.question: Which of the following correctly compares the kinetic energy and the momentum of the two-cart-spring system after the collision to those quantities before the collision? Kinetic Energy Magnitude of Momentum A Increases Decreases B Increases Stays the same C Stays the same Increases D Stays the same Stays the same

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
